entity

Class UserSearchCriteria

  • entity.UserSearchCriteria
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bean, Serializable, Versionable

    public class UserSearchCriteria
implements Bean, Serializable, Versionable
    Encapsulates the search criteria for a User search. Key points in the system for user search include, the user search from the admin page, user picker on assignment pages, and the general user search page.

      boolean isFieldChanged(IPropertyReference<KeyableBean,Object> ref)
      Delegates to isFieldChanged(IEntityPropertyInfo), using the referenced property literal.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performGroupUserSearch()
      Searches for visible UserGroups with users matching the last name and first name fields specified in the criteria. Visible user groups have groups that are in the same security zone(s) as the current user (see {@link User#getGroupsInSecurityZones()}) unless the user has the special "view all users" permission, in which case all groups are visible.

      Note that since this search takes its results from the UserGroup table, users with no groups will not be returned.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearch()
      Performs a User search based on the passed-in criteria.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximity()
      Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of User(Base?) entities.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximity(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation)
      Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of User(Base?) entities.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximity(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation, ProximitySearchPageHelper inPsph)
      Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of UserBase entities.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximityForAssignmentCandidateUsers(Key[] groupIds, SystemPermissionType[] requiredPermissions)
      Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Excludes users that are inactive or lack required permissions. Results are returned as a query of UserBase entities.
      IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchWithOrganization()
      Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established, but requires that an organization has been set and that the organization's id is not temporary.

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchWithOrganization()

      • performSearchByProximityForAssignmentCandidateUsers

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximityForAssignmentCandidateUsers(Key[] groupIds,
                                                                         SystemPermissionType[] requiredPermissions)
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Excludes users that are inactive or lack required permissions. Results are returned as a query of UserBase entities.
        Parameters:
        groupIds - If not null or empty, the list will be used to restrict to search on users with
        requiredPermissions - permissions that users must have
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performSearchByProximity

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximity()
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of User(Base?) entities.
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performSearchByProximity

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximity(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation)
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of User(Base?) entities.
        Parameters:
        webLocation - the Pebbles/PCF location within the UI. This must be null if this is being called from a scripting context.
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performSearchByProximity

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performSearchByProximity(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location webLocation,
                                              ProximitySearchPageHelper inPsph)
        Performs a search based on the criteria that have been established. Results are returned as a query of UserBase entities.
        Parameters:
        webLocation - the Pebbles/PCF location within the UI. This must be null if this is being called from a scripting context.
        inPsph - the ProximitySearchPagerHelper object from the calling page within the ui. This must be null if this is being called from a scripting context.
        Returns:
        a query of User entities

      • performGroupUserSearch

        IQueryBeanResult<Bean> performGroupUserSearch()
        Searches for visible UserGroups with users matching the last name and first name fields specified in the criteria. Visible user groups have groups that are in the same security zone(s) as the current user (see {@link User#getGroupsInSecurityZones()}) unless the user has the special "view all users" permission, in which case all groups are visible.

        Note that since this search takes its results from the UserGroup table, users with no groups will not be returned.

        Returns:
        all visible user groups that match the criteria
